extendedInfo.description: "The Language App Finder" can help you discover "Apps for learning languages" from the tens of thousands of applications in the Android Market. You can effectively search by category, the language you wish to learn, or the application language to find the app that's just right for you."ãLearning LanguageãSort by language you want to learn.ï¼eg.
